name: DeviantArt - Fairloke's Eclipse Style Profile Page
description: Relook Profile Page with Fairloke's Eclipse design. Not Compatible with "Eclipse Exp+" and "Profile Page Style" family.

user.name: Zigaudrey
user.about: A person who creates CSS style because there are things I don't agree.

additional_info:
Work with All Themes and while Log Out

This is made out of tribute of Fairloke's Eclipse design for Profiles in 2018.
Unfortunately, I have no idea how to give customization, so, the color scheme is based on the Default one.
https://www.deviantart.com/fairloke/art/How-DeviantART-Eclipse-should-have-been-773699472

You can see all color scheme here:
https://sta.sh/22ad2bthv1sy
